name: Crash Team Rumble
description: CRASH TEAM RUMBLE IS A 4V4 TEAM-BASED COMPETITION WHERE THE ICONIC HEROES AND VILLAINS OF THE CRASH UNIVERSE BATTLE TO CAPTURE MORE WUMPA FRUIT THAN THE OTHER TO CLAIM VICTORY. EACH HERO HAS UNIQUE SKILLS AND ABILITIES TO STRATEGICALLY USE TO WORK TOGETHER TO BATTLE THE OPPOSING TEAM, DEFEND THEIR OWN WUMPA BANK, AND CAPTURE KEY POINTS AROUND THE MAP TO HELP THEIR TEAM.
